value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.19995v1", "title": "Separability of unipotent-free abelian subgroups in linear groups", "summary": "Let ${\\bf F}$ be a field of characteristic zero. It is proved that for any\nfinitely generated linear group $\\Gamma<\\mathsf{GL}_n({\\bf F})$, every\nunipotent-free abelian subgroup of $\\Gamma$ is separable.", "main_category": "math.GR", "categories": "math.GR", "published": "2025-04-28T17:15:47Z"}
